channel.title: My commands wont work? it is compiling!

item.title: My commands wont work? it is compiling!
item.dc:creator: @FuryofEdge FuryofEdge
item.description:
@FuryofEdge wrote:

ew. thats ugly coding =\ maybe its just the source coder was different. idk. make it like…

if (command.startsWith(“pots”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(potsnumberhere, howevermanyhere.);
}

its way less laggier… takes up like nowhere near the space of yours. every extra item you want to add, just put another addItem under the first one. GL =]

Read full topic
item.source: My commands wont work? it is compiling!

item.title: My commands wont work? it is compiling!
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

hi guys, i recently added

::pots1
::pots2
::pots3
::pkgear

to my server, i compile it, with no errors, and it doesnt work? I’ll show you the code i using
its on bulby source, in the commands bit.
\Bulby\io\packets\commands.java

[code]if (cmd[0].equals(“pots1”)) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 157, 28);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Type ::pots2 for sup attacks!”);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Blake has given you 28 super strength pots!!”);
}

if (cmd[0].equals(“pots2”)) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 145, 28);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Type ::pots3 for sup defence!”);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Blake has given you 28 super attack pots!!”);
}

if (cmd[0].equals(“pots3”)) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 145, 28);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Blake has given you 28 super defence pots!!”);
}

if (cmd[0].equals(“pkgear”)) {
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10828, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10551, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1079, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6585, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11732, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 7462, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8850, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4151, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6737, 1);
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Now goto ::bh and pk! protect item is disabled!!!”);
}
[/code]

help is greatly appreciated… thx
